key.keymap.cfg.title: Keymap
text.autoconfig.keymap.option.replaceKey: with the one provided by this mod
text.autoconfig.keymap.option.keybindKey: Shows the name of a keybind key on hover
(in case it gets cut off by screen size)
text.autoconfig.keymap.option.keybindNam: Shows the full name of a keybind on hover
(in case it gets cut off by screen size)
